definition: to sign one's name/visa/variant of 籤|签[qian1]
inscribed bamboo stick (used in divination, gambling, drawing lots etc)/small wood sliver/label/tag

sentences.english: Our consular officers are required to give the reason in writing.
sentences.chinese: 我们的领事官必须书面说明拒签原因。

sentences.english: I do understand the "logic" behind the visa officer's reasoning on his rejection.
sentences.chinese: 我理解这位签证官拒签决定背后的“逻辑”。

sentences.english: My hope is that there won't be a full-out denial of visas, just the background checks.
sentences.chinese: 我希望这不会是全盘拒签，而仅仅进行背景考察。

sentences.english: The processing fee is non-refundable for any application that is withdrawn or refused.
sentences.chinese: 任何撤销或被拒签的申请受理费用都不予退还。

sentences.english: Have you ever been refused a student visa to any other country?
sentences.chinese: 您是否曾被任何其他国家拒签过？

sentences.english: Please note that the processing fee is non-refundable for any application that is withdrawn or refused.
sentences.chinese: 请注意任何撤销或被拒签的申请受理费不予退还。

sentences.english: Moreover, the processing fee is non-refundable for any application that is withdrawn orrefused.
sentences.chinese: 并且，任何撤销或被拒签的申请受理费也不予退还。

sentences.english: After an overcome, they received a denial notice.
sentences.chinese: 在补交了一次资料后接到拒签通知。

sentences.english: The court may also permit the debtor in possession to reject and cancel contracts.
sentences.chinese: 破产法庭还允许持产负债人拒签或取消合同。

sentences.english: I am aware that the visa fee is not refunded if the visa is refused.
sentences.chinese: 本人知道如果所申请的签证被拒签，签证费不予退还。

sentences.english: Yes, last year my visa application was rejected for financial reasons.
sentences.chinese: 是的，去年我由于资金原因被拒签了。

sentences.english: Did you be rejected by other countries?
sentences.chinese: 你是否曾被其它国家拒签过？

definition: to reject (visa application etc)/(commerce) to return to sender/item returned to sender
Schengen, village in Luxemburg, location of the 1985 signing of the agreement to create the Schengen area 申根區|申根区[Shen1 gen1 qu1]
permanent residency permit (originally referred specifically to the US green card)
to return merchandise/to withdraw a product
